data.title: Place attachment and brand loyalty: the moderating role of customer experience in the restaurant setting
data.meta_description: Place attachment and brand loyalty: the moderating role of customer experience in the restaurant setting - Author: Michael Boadi Nyamekye, Diyawu Rahman Adam, Henry Boateng, John Paul Kosiba
